review: It's mostly worthless. Not worth $35 even since you get zero functionality from the device. They advertise it like it's a Roku or Apple TV, but the only thing you can do is stream from supported apps. If the app doesn't support it then you can just stream your entire phone, for example to stream audio from random apps.The best way is just to modify your android to support Airplay.
